name: My Lost Memories
description:
This is the story of a little red monster that one day woke up on an unknow place with amnesia, seeing that he doesn't really remember anything he decides to look around for clues on his past. Will he be able to remember?

Controls -

Press E to advance through the text and interact with the chests

Press Z to Shoot Fireballs

You can use the Directional Arrows or WAD to move around and jump

You can always use the Comment Section down below to report bugs. Thank you!
